Amazon product videography project samples

Amazon product video for Zenakio / France

Amazon Product Video to promote the carpetry tool called combination square. We filmed this video for a French brand called Zenakio.

E-bike product video ad for XQISIT / Germany

The product is the XQISIT E-Bike X-160. This is our second product video ad project for the German brand XQISIT. The first one was the video of an e-scooter.

E-commerce video ad for Twinz’Up / France

E-commerce video ad for the Twinz’Up brand. The product is a wine set consisting of an electric bottle opener and many other accessories. The ecom video and the product lifestyle images we created for this project are used in the Amazon listing.

Why Amazon brands love us

  1. We make your products stand out.

    Devoted to making your products emotionally irresistible within the Amazon landscape, we offer a complete range of Amazon product videos.

    • Sponsored brands video ads

      The sponsored brands videos are used to stand out in search results and help buyers discover your brand and products on Amazon

    • Product Listing Page Videos

      The product listing videos encrease conversions by 9,7% and help your customers to understand your product better and feel engaged.

    • Premium A+ Content videos

      The A+ content videos increases conversions by another 20% and create consistent brand experience on Amazon

  2. Models and actors of any demographic.

    We can find models guided by your buyer persona and matching our video concept perfectly.

  3. Lifestyle location scouting for each project.

    We're skilled in location scouting, finding diverse settings, and acquiring props to create engaging stories for your Amazon product.
    • Kitchen?
    • Gym?
    • Bedroom?

  4. Our dedicated filmmaking team and expertise.

    We exist to help clients add value to their businesses by giving their products an emotional touch that resonates with the e-commerce audience.

    • Founder-led project management

      Alex Shalenniy, the founder of WindySoul Studio, ensures a smooth, clear, and well-organized project journey for you.

    • Top-tier film-making crew

      This encompasses idea generation, scriptwriting, cinematography, editing, infographic design, and 3D modeling. See the About Us page to meet the team.

    • Professional filming equipment.

      Utilizing professional tools like Blackmagic 6K Pro, Prime L EF lenses, Aputure lighting, cinematography frost frames, Avenger C-stands, and more.

Video Production Pricing

Every brand and product is a unique story. Our starting rate for Amazon product videography is $2500 USD. Let's initiate a conversation about your project to tailor a personalized proposal for you.

Amazon Product Photography

Beyond videography, we excel in product photography as well. Our expertise covers white background hero shots, informative infographic still images, and lifestyle photography featuring models. The latter often complements our product video production efforts.

Product shipping

Ship your products to our studio in Tbilisi, Georgia, leveraging trusted carriers like UPS, Fedex, or DHL Express. Shipping typically takes 3-7 days from Europe and the US and up to 9 days from China.
